name: RaceDepartment Dark v0.71
description:
WARNING: This userstyle is currently not functional, since RaceDepartment has undergone several changes in its design recently. I will update this style at some point, but it will take some time. For now, avoid using this style.

A simple darkened version of RaceDepartment. Note that not every aspect of the website has been altered, as I simply wanted to modify some of the colours of the website. This style is still a work in progress, but it should be fine for browsing through the news section and threads on RD.
additional_info:
v0.60 - Work on News section and Threads almost complete.

v0.63 - Colour changes to polls and post details (such as time when post was made)

v0.65 - Large changes to forums - more consistent colour scheme

v0.66 - Minor changes to forums and threads to suit the overall colour scheme

v0.67 - Colour changes to tabs and some minor fixes

v0.70 - Massive changes to various pages, such as events page and videos page

v0.71 - Block quotes match the color scheme now

v0.73 - Temporary fixes due to website design changes

Please also note that this is my first ever style. I don't have any significant knowledge with CSS, but I do know some programming. Most of this was done by inspecting the source and using trial-and-error. This means that this code is not as optimised as I would have liked it to have been. Still, it shouldn't be too hard to understand, though I haven't done any commenting in the code.

Report any issues to my email (mthaleemATgmailDOTcom).

Thank You
